Dgame.Math.Pixel



struct Pixel;
A Pixel has coordinates (position) and a color. It defines a basic component for shapes.

Author:
rschuett

float x;
The coordinates

float y;
The coordinates

float z;
The coordinates

float r;
The color components

float g;
The color components

float b;
The color components

float a;
The color components

this();
Disable default CTor

this(float x, float y);
CTor

this(ref const Vector2f position);
CTor

this(ref const Vector2f position, ref const Color col);
CTor

pure nothrow void set(ref const Vector2f position, ref const Color col);
Set both, a (new) position and a (new) color.

pure nothrow void setPosition(ref const Vector2f position);
Set a (new) position

pure nothrow void setPosition(float px, float py, float pz = 0.000000F);
Set a (new) position

pure nothrow void setColor(ref const Color col);
Set a (new) color

const Color getAsColor();
Create a Color from the color data

const pure nothrow Vector2f getAsVector();
Create a Vector2f from the position data (the z coordinate is ignored).
